question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about the Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)?
option1: It aims to generate employment opportunities in rural as well as urban areas of the country.
option2: It is being implemented by Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC).
option3: Only new projects are considered for sanction under this programme.
option4: It is an initiative by the Ministry of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship.
answer: It is an initiative by the Ministry of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship.
explanation: Fourth statement is incorrect. Prime Minister Employment Generation Programme is in an initiative by the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises and not by the Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship. Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP) aims to generate employment opportunities in rural as well as urban areas of the country. It is being implemented by Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC). Only new projects are considered for sanction under this programme. The maximum cost of the manufacturing unit admissible under manufacturing sector is Rs.25 lakh and under business/service sector is Rs.10 lakh. Any individual, above 18 years of age is eligible to seek assistance. If the project size is above Rs.10 lakh in the manufacturing sector and above Rs. 5 lakh in the business/service sector, the applicant must be at least Class VIII Pass.
